name: Pokédex™ 3D Pro
description: The Perfect Companion Application to Pokémon Black Version 2 and Pokémon White Version 2 The Pokédex 3D Pro application is a fully enhanced and upgraded version of the original Pokédex 3D application. It includes detailed information about more than 640 Pokémon from the Pokémon video game series. The Pokédex 3D Pro application also includes in-depth sorting, comparison and ranking tools, as well as comprehensive details about the moves each Pokémon can learn, and how and when each Pokémon evolves. Additionally, the application features augmented-reality capabilities, including the ability to take photos of Pokémon in the real world.
